Title: Wanted: Watcher's Golden Girdle
Description:
<The posted sign is written in beautiful calligraphy.>

The archivists humbly request that all expedition members seek out the Watcher's Golden Girdle for our artifact archives.

If acquired, please deliver to Cataloger Jakes for processing and compensation.

You may wish to start your search at our northern dig site, where Elementalist Taiyang has reported a malfunctioning Watcher causing trouble.
PortraitGiverText: A malfunctioning Watcher has the girdle around its waist!
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Cataloger Jakes in the Dragonscale Basecamp.
RewardText:
Whew, glad I don't have to wear this heavy thing!

I'll ensure this is properly documented, researched, and archived for the expedition.
